import truncate from 'html-truncate';
 
const state = {
	expanded: 'is-expanded',
};
 
const selectors = {
	excerpt: '[data-excerpt]',
	expandButton: '[data-expand]',
	initialChars: 'initial-chars',
	collapseButton: '[data-collapse]',
	suffix: 'suffix',
};
 
const expand = $el => () => {
	$el.addClass(state.expanded);
};
 
const collapse = $el => () => {
	$el.removeClass(state.expanded);
};
 
const clampText = ($el, size, suffix) => {
	const clampedText = truncate($el.html(), size, { ellipsis: suffix });
 
	$el.html(clampedText);
};
 
const buttonShowMore = ($el) => {
	const $excerpt = $el.find(selectors.excerpt);
	const initialChars = $excerpt.data(selectors.initialChars);
	const suffix = $excerpt.data(selectors.suffix) ? $excerpt.data(selectors.suffix) : '';
	const $expandButton = $el.find(selectors.expandButton);
	const $collapseButton = $el.find(selectors.collapseButton);
 
	if ($excerpt.length && initialChars) {
		clampText($excerpt, initialChars, suffix);
	}
 
	$expandButton.on('click', expand($el));
	$collapseButton.on('click', collapse($el));
};
 
export default buttonShowMore;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Aug 28 2017 16:13:34 GMT+0200 (CEST)
